long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ü§ñ Have Artificial Intelligence write X.com (Twitter) Posts for you in 3 easy steps.

1. Go to any webpage
2. Copy an article from that webpage
3. Paste the content into the XPressPost Chrome Extension

üèÜ That's it! The extension will craft an engaging Post (Tweet) for you in 30 seconds or less. 

üìò There's no need to constantly worry about what you are going to post about or researching for hours on end for X.com post ideas. This tool does it all for you in a fraction of the time. You literally now have an endless supply of X.com posts at your disposal day/night. Plus, you can even adjust the Type and Tone of your posts. Just be sure to provide a source for your Posts!
